titleStmt.title: Reason and religion, or, The grounds and measures of devotion, consider'd from the nature of God, and the nature of man in several contemplations : with exercises of devotion applied to every contemplation / by John Norris ...
titleStmt.author: Norris, John, 1657-1711.

notesStmt.note: Added t.p. on p. [161]: The second part : wherein the grounds and measures of devotion are consider'd from the nature of man.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
